Seeking a hearing aid (for both ears) for a 78-year-old female client who is currently living in a public rental flat with her eldest son. She has significant hearing impairment in both ears, which affects her ability to communicate effectively and respond to sounds in her environment — potentially posing safety concerns at home.

A hearing aid would greatly enhance her quality of life by helping her reconnect with others, participate more confidently in daily activities, and stay safe in her living space.

If you have a working hearing aid (preferably digital and suitable for elderly use) that you are no longer using, we would be sincerely grateful for your contribution.

Your kindness can make a meaningful difference in this senior’s life. 

If you are able to help or know someone who can, please WhatsApp me @+6591278766. Thank you for your kindness and generosity! 🙏💙

name: Adult Diapers

Donation Request: Adult Diapers (Size L) Needed for Elderly with Dementia

I’m reaching out on behalf of my Client, a 61-year-old Male caregiver who is currently facing financial difficulties while caring for his 87-year-old mother who has dementia. Due to his limited financial resources, he is unable to afford adult diapers which are essential for his mother’s daily care.

We are looking for donations of Adult Diapers (Size L) – any brand is appreciated.

If you or someone you know would like to donate or have supplies to give, please feel free to reach out to me via WhatsApp at +65 9127 8766.

Your support will go a long way in easing the caregiving burden on my Client and improving the quality of life for his mother. Thank you for your kindness and generosity!

414 community hub has a communal lunch initiative called FoodWeShare, where every Tuesday and Thursday, aunties and uncles from Ang Mo Kio and beyond come together to prepare and share lunch as a community. 

414 community hub is outgrowing its current set of kitchenware as it welcomes more residents to enjoy communal lunch. A large induction wok will support the resident-led initiative's efforts to build thriving and connected communities.
